Deemos and Arrow step out and move to the base's entrance. They were both w=
alking like they were purely business and kept their straight looks of evil=
ness on their faces. They get inside. Arrow looks around, but Deemos keeps =
his glance occupied with Sting and Hollywood.

Deemos: Who is that?

Referr=
ing to Hollywood...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: RoboRick007
  T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 6:16 PM
  Subject=
: Re: Secret Messages


  : : Diesel / Razor : :

  Diesel gets up and walk=
s out of the ship.

  Diesel: Come on guys.

  Diesel opens a link to the b=
ase.

  Diesel: Razor, your friends have arrived. Let us in.

  Razor lets =
the shields down and opens the doors.

  Diesel starts to walk in.
    ----=
- Original Message ----- 
    From: LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 6:12 PM
    Subject: Re: Secret Mes=
sages


    : : Sting : :

    Sting watches as they decend, and then feels=
 the ship stop.  They'd arrived.  He opens the entrance/exit doors.

    St=
ing:  At last, we've made it to Earth!

    He gets out of the ship, and to=
oks a good look around Earth, and waits for the others.
